name: Entity (itch) (leafthief)
description:
Entity was made for the Ludum Dare #20 game jam in April 2011 for the theme "It's dangerous to go alone. Take this!" in 48 hours.

HOW TO PLAY: Find all 4 photographs and use them - but watch out: It's dangerous to go alone.
Use Arrow keys to navigate and X to activate an aura/photograph.

The danger of going alone becomes an immediate threat. You can entertain connections to others, walk by their side. You could try to find your own way.
